Ibanez - RG3XXV This Ibanez RG3XXV is in great shape. This guitar is the perfect shredder guitar, with a DiMarzio D-Activator in the bridge and a single coil size Air Norton in the neck. The slim 3 piece maple neck allows for slick, fast playing and the Edge tremolo allow for insane dive bombs and bends.
